documents.documents: Select a document to start a new chat

chat.topic_summary: Hello! Welcome to Agrobot Documentary, I'm here to start a new conversation about topics related to you. Ask me!

loadDocumentList_error.title: Failed to load documents
loadDocumentList_error.content: An unexpected Error has occured, plese try again later

chat.confirm_body: Are you sure you want to empty these messages? you cannot undo this action.
chat.message: Welcome to Agrobot documentary! Increase your productivity and get instant answers from your most important documents with our powerful AI.
chat.sub_message: Create a repository of categorized documents and start using the chat!
chat.documents: Select a document to start a new chat

insufficient_credits.title: Insufficient Credits
insufficient_credits.message: You don't have enough credits to generate a question, you can top up more credits in the profile section

no_documents_error.title: You can't talk with this topic
no_documents_error.content: This topic has no related documents. Upload a new document and assign it to this topic to start a conversation.
